metadata.title: CVE-2020-35479 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.35.1 allows XSS via BlockLogFormatter.php.Language::translateBlockExpiry itself does not escape in all code paths.For example, the return of Language::userTimeAndDate is is always unsafefor HTML in a month value. This affects MediaWiki 1.12.0 and later.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
